name: Santa Game (thebillings)
description:
This project was created alongside the middle schoolers in my Game Design class. The Final Exam for the fall 2021 semester was GameJam: Santa. 

I made this one! 

"This semester I played around with using a mouse as a control, as well as learning how to animate. Hence why everything is walking the exact same way.

I decided that I wanted to stick to the skills they've learned and used, as well as limiting myself to drag n drop with limited function calls. 

Voices are myself with 2 cameos from my students.
